anya-e0904n0:119_1: uppalavaṇṇā bhante therī dutiyaaggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ
anya-e0904n0:119_2: yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:120_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā” –
anya-e0904n0:122_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu terasasu therīsu paṭācārānāma therī kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:123_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therikāsu paṭācārā therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
anya-e0904n0:123_2: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:142_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā” –
anya-e0904n0:144_0: Pucchā – dhammadinnā pana āvuso therī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:145_1: dhammadinnā bhante therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā”ti
anya-e0904n0:145_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:150_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā” –
anya-e0904n0:152_0: Pucchā – bhaddakaccānānāma āvuso yasodharātherī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:153_1: bhaddakaccānā bhante yasodharātherī bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:154_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā” –
anya-e0904n0:156_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu tapussabhallikānāma vāṇijā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:157_1: tapussabhallikā bhante vāṇijā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā”ti,
anya-e0904n0:157_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:158_0: “Ete bhante mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca,
anya-e0904n0:158_1: upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate” hu –
anya-e0904n0:159_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā” –
anya-e0904n0:161_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:162_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:162_2: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko”ti.
anya-e0904n0:162_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:163_0: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko–
anya-e0904n0:165_0: Pucchā – sūrambaṭṭho nāma āvuso upāsako bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:166_1: sūrambaṭṭho upāsako “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho”ti
anya-e0904n0:166_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:167_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho” hu –
anya-e0904n0:169_1: etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu sujātānāma upāsikā seniyadhītā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:170_1: sujātā bhante seniyadhītā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā”ti,
anya-e0904n0:170_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:171_0: “Etā mayaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca,
anya-e0904n0:171_1: upāsikāyo no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetā saraṇaṃ gatā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:172_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā” –
anya-e0904n0:174_0: Pucchā – visākhā pana āvuso upāsikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:175_1: visākhā bhante upāsikā migāramātā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā
anya-e0904n0:175_2: migāramātā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:176_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:178_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarānāma upāsikā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:179_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarā upāsikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:179_2: upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:180_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:182_0: Pucchā – kāḷīnāma āvuso upāsikā kuraragharikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:183_1: kāḷī bhante upāsikā kuraragharikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī
anya-e0904n0:183_2: upāsikā kuraragharikā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:184_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā” –
anya-e0904n0:186_0: Pucchā – sakalāpi āvuso aṭṭhānapāḷi bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:187_2: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañcisaṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
anya-e0904n0:187_6: ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalāpi aṭṭhānapāḷi bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:189_0: Pucchā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ āvuso paṭhamavagge kīdisī dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n0:190_1: ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ bhante paṭhamavagge “ekadhammo bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya
anya-e0904n0:190_2: nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n0:190_5: ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya
anya-e0904n0:190_6: sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanā desitā.
anya-e0904n0:191_0: Pucchā – dutiyavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:192_1: dutiyavagge bhante bhagavatā “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:192_2: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n0:192_3: uppannā vā akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti,
anya-e0904n0:192_5: Micchādiṭṭhikassa bhikkhave anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n0:192_6: uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:194_0: Pucchā – tatiyavagge pana āvuso pañcamādīni aṭṭha suttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:195_1: tatiyavagge bhante pañcamādīni aṭṭhasuttāni “durakkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti,
anya-e0904n0:195_7: Svākkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti,
anya-e0904n0:195_12: Taṃkissahetu svākkhātattā bhikkhave dhammassā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:197_0: Pucchā – aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:198_1: aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge bhante “accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0904n0:198_2: ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0904n0:198_3: ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti evamādikā bhante bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:200_0: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso kāyagatāsativaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:201_1: yassa kassaci bhikkhave mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo,
anya-e0904n0:201_3: evameva bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā,
anya-e0904n0:201_4: antogadhā tassa kusalā dhammā yekeci vijjābhāgiyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi kāyagatāsativaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:203_0: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso amatavaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsato.
anya-e0904n0:204_8: yesaṃ kāyagatāsati paribhuttāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi amatavaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:206_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte kammakaraṇavagge paṭhamaṃ vajjasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:207_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave vajjāni.
anya-e0904n0:207_2: Katamāni dve diṭṭhadhammikañca vajjaṃ samparāyikañca vajja”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:208_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikassa vajjassa bhāyissāma,
anya-e0904n0:210_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ padhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:211_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:211_4: yañca agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:211_5: Imāni kho bhikkhave dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:213_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:214_3: idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyaduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n0:214_13: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā tapanīyāti.
anya-e0904n0:216_0: Pucchā – catutthaṃ pana āvuso atapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:217_1: catutthaṃ bhante atapanīyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā atapanīyā.
anya-e0904n0:217_3: idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyasucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n0:217_14: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:219_0: Pucchā – pañcamaṃ pana āvuso upaññātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:220_1: pañcamaṃ bhante upaññātasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ upaññāsiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:220_5: taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:220_6: yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:220_7: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:222_0: Pucchā – navamaṃ pana āvuso cariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:223_1: navamaṃ bhante cariyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā sukkā lokaṃ pālenti.
anya-e0904n0:223_4: Ime kho bhikkhave dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
anya-e0904n0:225_1: adhikaraṇavagge pana āvuso sattamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:226_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:226_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n0:226_3: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:226_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā
anya-e0904n0:226_5: apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:227_0: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n0:227_1: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n0:228_0: “Katattāca brāhmaṇa akatattāca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti” –
anya-e0904n0:229_0: Ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n0:229_1: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti –
anya-e0904n0:230_0: Katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n0:231_0: Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ –
anya-e0904n0:232_0: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu.
anya-e0904n0:234_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:235_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmato ānandassa “ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda akaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṃ manoduccarita”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:236_0: “Ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda karaṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyasucaritaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ manosucaritaṃ” –
anya-e0904n0:238_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte adhikaraṇavagge navamasuttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:239_3: Nocedaṃ bhikkhave sakkā abhavissa akusalaṃ pajahituṃ,
anya-e0904n0:239_5: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave sakkā akusalaṃ pajahituṃ,
anya-e0904n0:239_7: Akusalañca hidaṃ bhikkhave pahīnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyya,
anya-e0904n0:239_9: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n0:239_10: tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:241_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaekādasamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:242_1: tattheva bhante dasamaekādasamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n0:242_4: dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
anya-e0904n0:242_5: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca.
anya-e0904n0:242_6: “Dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n0:242_9: sunikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
anya-e0904n0:242_10: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca.
anya-e0904n0:245_0: Pucchā – bālavagge pana āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:246_1: bālavagge bhante dutiyaṃ suttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:246_3: duṭṭho vā dosantaro saddho vā duggahitena.
anya-e0904n0:246_4: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti,
anya-e0904n0:248_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:249_1: tattheva bhante tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:249_3: yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n0:249_4: Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti’ dīpeti.

anya-e0904n0:480_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:481_4: “ehitvaṃ ambhopurisa ye puratthimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ,
anya-e0904n0:481_8: Ye dakkhiṇāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ,
anya-e0904n0:481_9: tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:483_0: Ehi tvaṃ ambho purisa sabbacelāni nikkhipitvā evaṃ vadehi.
anya-e0904n0:484_0: Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcana tatthi.
anya-e0904n0:486_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyuposatho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:487_2: upakkiliṭṭhassa visākhe cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
anya-e0904n0:487_3: Kathañca visākhe upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
anya-e0904n0:487_4: Idha visākhe ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0904n0:487_5: sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:487_8: ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyantīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyo uposatho vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:488_1: evaṃ upavutthassa pana āvuso ariyuposathassa kathaṃ mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0904n0:489_5: seyyathāpi visākhe yo imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ mahājanapadānaṃ pahūtarattajanapadānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreyya,
anya-e0904n0:489_6: seyyathidaṃ “aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalānaṃ vajjīnaṃ mallānaṃ cetīnaṃ vaṅgānaṃ kurūnaṃ pañcālānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:489_7: macchānaṃ sūrasenānaṃ assakānaṃ avantīnaṃ gandhārānaṃ kambojānaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:489_8: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa uposathassa etaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā evaṃ
anya-e0904n0:492_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso tikanipāte ānandavagge dutiyaṃ ājīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:493_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ ājīvakasāvakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:493_2: Aññataro bhante ājīvakasāvako gahapati āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto,
anya-e0904n0:493_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gahapati taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n0:493_7: tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:494_0: “Kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā, ke loke sukatā”.
anya-e0904n0:497_0: “Abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya” –
anya-e0904n0:499_1: tattheva āvuso navamaṃ gandhajātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:500_2: Āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “tīṇimāni bhante gandhajātāni,
anya-e0904n0:500_3: yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati no paṭivātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0904n0:500_4: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci gandhajātaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:500_5: yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati paṭivātampi gandho gacchati,
anya-e0904n0:500_10: anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:506_0: Pucchā – samaṇavagge āvuso dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:507_1: samaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gadrabho gogaṇaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ‘ahampi dammo ahampi dammo’ti,
anya-e0904n0:507_2: tassa na tādiso vaṇṇo hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:507_3: na tādiso saro hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:507_4: na tādisaṃ padaṃ hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:507_5: so gogaṇaṃyeva piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ahampi dammo ahampi dammo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:511_1: tattheva āvuso ekādasamaṃ saṅkavāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:512_1: kosalesu bhante saṅkavāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigame kassapagottaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:512_2: Kassapa gotto bhante bhikkhu bhagavati manopadūsitvā bhagavato santike accayaṃ accayato desesi.
anya-e0904n0:512_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “thero cepi kassapa bhikkhu na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī.
anya-e0904n0:512_6: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:515_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte loṇakapallavagge paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:516_1: loṇakapallavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
anya-e0904n0:516_3: idha bhikkhave kassako gahapati sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ.
anya-e0904n0:516_4: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0904n0:516_5: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi.
anya-e0904n0:516_6: Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:519_0: Pucchā – sambodhavagge panāvuso pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:520_1: sambodhavagge bhante pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ “ruṇṇamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ gītaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:520_2: ummattakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ naccaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:520_3: komārakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakahasitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:520_4: Tasmātiha bhikkhave setughāto gīte setughāto nacce,
anya-e0904n0:520_5: alaṃ vo dhammappamoditānaṃ sataṃ sitaṃ sitamattāyā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:522_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ arakkhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:523_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anātapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “citte gahapati arakkhite kāyakammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n0:523_4: Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n0:523_6: manokammampi avassutaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:526_0: Pucchā – āpāyikavagge āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:527_1: āpāyikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vipattiyo.
anya-e0904n0:527_8: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sīlavipattī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:530_1: kusināravagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ kusinārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:531_1: kusinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “idha bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
anya-e0904n0:531_2: tamenaṃ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimantetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:533_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:534_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante hatthakena devaputtena saddhiṃ “ye te hatthaka dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ,
anya-e0904n0:534_2: apinu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:536_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ anuruddhasuttaṃ kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:537_1: aṭṭhamaṃ bhante anuruddhasuttaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0904n0:537_2: “yaṃ kho te āvuso anuruddhaṃ evaṃ hoti ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ
anya-e0904n0:538_0: “Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatu” –
anya-e0904n0:541_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte kusināravagge navamaṃ paṭicchannasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:542_1: navamaṃ bhante paṭicchannasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭāni.
anya-e0904n0:542_3: mātugāmo bhikkhave paṭicchanno āvahati no vivaṭo,
anya-e0904n0:542_4: brāhmaṇānaṃ bhikkhave mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti no vivaṭā,
anya-e0904n0:542_5: micchādiṭṭhi bhikkhave paṭicchannā āvahati no vivaṭā.
anya-e0904n0:542_6: Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:544_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ lekhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:545_1: dasamaṃ bhante lekhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:545_3: pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo pathavilekhūpamo puggalo udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
anya-e0904n0:545_4: Katamo ca bhikkhave pāsāṇa lekhūpamo puggalo,
anya-e0904n0:545_5: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati,
anya-e0904n0:545_6: so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n0:545_7: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā,
anya-e0904n0:545_9: evameva kho bhikkhave idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati,
anya-e0904n0:545_10: so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n0:545_11: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:548_0: Pucchā – yodhājīvavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:549_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:549_3: Kesakambalo bhikkhave sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso.
anya-e0904n0:549_5: makkhalivādo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyatīti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:552_0: Pucchā – maṅgalavagge panāvuso navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:553_1: maṅgalavagge bhante navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā.
anya-e0904n0:554_0: “Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā. Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”.
anya-e0904n0:556_0: Pucchā – tattho āvuso dasamaṃ pubbaṇhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:557_1: dasamaṃ bhante pubbaṇhasuttaṃ “ye bhikkhave sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti,
anya-e0904n0:557_9: Susāyanho bhikkhave tesaṃ sattāna”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:562_1: catukkanipāte pana āvuso bhaṇḍagāmavagge paṭhamaṃ anubuddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā sattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:563_1: vajjīsu bhante bhaṇḍagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “catunnaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n0:563_2: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
anya-e0904n0:563_4: ariyassa bhikkhave sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
anya-e0904n0:563_7: Ariyāya bhikkhave vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva
anya-e0904n0:565_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:566_1: tattha bhante chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:566_6: bahussuto sutena upapanno”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:569_0: Pu – caravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:570_1: caravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ “carato cepi bhikkhave bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvibhatto vā,
anya-e0904n0:570_2: taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gametī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:573_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte uruvelavagge tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:574_1: uruvelavagge bhante tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ “loko bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho,
anya-e0904n0:574_5: lokanirodho bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato,
anya-e0904n0:574_7: lokanirodhagāmini paṭipadā tathāgatassa bhāvitā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:608_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ brahmacariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:609_1: pañcamaṃ bhante brahmacariyasuttaṃ “nayidaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanatthaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:609_6: Atha kho idaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati saṃvaratthaṃ pahānatthaṃ virāgatthaṃ nirodhattha”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:611_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:612_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā,
anya-e0904n0:612_5: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
anya-e0904n0:612_7: na ca cīvarahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0904n0:612_9: laddhā ca cīvaraṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati,
anya-e0904n0:612_10: tāya ca pana itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā nevattānukkaṃseti no paraṃ vambheti.
anya-e0904n0:612_11: Yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajāno paṭissabho,
anya-e0904n0:612_12: ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhito”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:615_0: Pu – cakkavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:616_1: cakkavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni,
anya-e0904n0:616_3: yehi samannāgatā devamanussā nacirasseva mahantattaṃ vepullattaṃ pāpuṇanti bhogesu.
anya-e0904n0:616_5: patirūpadesavāso sappurisāvassayo attasammāpaṇidhi pubbe ca katapuññatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:618_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:619_1: tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave saṅgahavatthūni.
anya-e0904n0:619_3: dānaṃ peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyā samānattatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:621_0: Pu – bhattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:622_1: tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanusamayaṃ āsayā nikkhamati,
anya-e0904n0:622_4: samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati,
anya-e0904n0:622_5: tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:624_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte cakkavagge chaṭṭhaṃ doṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:625_1: antarā ca bhante ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabyaṃ doṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:625_2: Doṇo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:625_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa devo bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:626_0: “Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, na vatimāni manussabhūtassa padāni bhavissanti”.
anya-e0904n0:632_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ ujjayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:633_1: navamaṃ bhante ujjayasuttaṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi,
anya-e0904n0:633_2: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
anya-e0904n0:633_3: Yathārūpe kho brāhmaṇa yaññe gāvo haññanti,
anya-e0904n0:633_6: vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:637_0: Pu – rohitassavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:638_1: rohitassavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā,
anya-e0904n0:638_3: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n0:638_4: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n0:638_5: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n0:638_6: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:640_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:641_1: tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave pañhabyākaraṇāni.
anya-e0904n0:641_6: atthi bhikkhave pañho ṭhapanīyo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:644_1: puññābhisandavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:645_1: puññābhisandavagge bhante tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ antarā ca madhuraṃ antarā ca verañjaṃ sambahule gahapatayo
anya-e0904n0:645_2: ca gahapatāniyo ca ārabbha “cattārome gahapatayo saṃvāsā.
anya-e0904n0:645_7: devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:647_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puññābhisandavagge pañcamaṃ samajīvisuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:648_1: pañcamaṃ bhante samajīvisuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyyuṃ ce gahapatayo ubho jānipatayo diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passituṃ,
anya-e0904n0:648_3: ubhova assu samasaddhā samasīlā samacāgā samapaññā,
anya-e0904n0:648_4: te diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passanti,
anya-e0904n0:648_5: abhisamparāyañca aññamaññaṃ passantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:651_1: pattakammavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:652_1: pattakammavagge bhante dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “cattārimāni
anya-e0904n0:652_2: gahapati sukhāni adhigamanīyāni gihinā kāmabhoginā kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0904n0:652_4: atthisukhaṃ bhogasukhaṃ anaṇyasukhaṃ anavajjasukha”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:654_0: Bhuñjaṃ bhogasukhaṃ macco, tato paññā vipassati;
anya-e0904n0:659_0: Pu – apaṇṇakavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:660_1: apaṇṇakavagge bhante tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ “catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato asappuriso veditabbo.
anya-e0904n0:660_3: idha bhikkhave asappuriso yo hoti parassa avaṇṇo taṃ apuṭṭhopi pātu karoti ko pana vādo puṭṭhassā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:663_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ acinteyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:664_1: sattamaṃ bhante acinteyyasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni,
anya-e0904n0:664_2: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
anya-e0904n0:664_4: buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
anya-e0904n0:664_5: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:667_0: Pu – macalavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:668_1: macalavagge bhante pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:671_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte asuravagge paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:672_1: asuravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:674_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ samādhisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:675_1: catutthaṃ bhante samādhisuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:675_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
anya-e0904n0:675_4: Idha pana bhikkhave puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya,
anya-e0904n0:675_6: Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo na ceva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa,
anya-e0904n0:675_8: Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa,
anya-e0904n0:675_9: lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:677_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ rāgavinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:678_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante rāgavinayasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:678_6: attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:681_1: valāhakavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ valāhakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:682_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “cattārome bhikkhave valāhakā.
anya-e0904n0:682_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjāmānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:682_13: gajjitā ca vassitā cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:684_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ udakarahadasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:685_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:687_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mūsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:688_1: sattamaṃ bhante mūsikasuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave mūsikā.
anya-e0904n0:688_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro mūsikūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:688_13: gādhaṃ kattā ca vasitā cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:690_1: saṃgītāpi āvuso aṅguttaranikāyato kānici suttāni uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā.
anya-e0904n0:690_2: Saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte valāhakavagge aṭṭhamaṃ balībaddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:691_1: valāhakavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ balībaddhasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave balībaddhā.
anya-e0904n0:691_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro balībaddhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:693_1: kesivagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ kesisuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:694_2: Kesi bhante assadammasārathi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi,
anya-e0904n0:694_3: kathaṃ pana bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vinetī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:694_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ahaṃ kho kesi purisadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi,
anya-e0904n0:694_11: iti devā iti manussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:695_0: “Tvaṃ khosi kesi paññāto assadammasārathīti, kathaṃ pana tvaṃ kesi assadammasārathi” –
anya-e0904n0:696_0: “Ahaṃ kho bhante assadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi” –
anya-e0904n0:697_0: “Sace te kesi assadammo saṇhena vinayaṃ na upeti,
anya-e0904n0:698_0: “Bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi, kathaṃ pana bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vineti” –
anya-e0904n0:699_0: Na 0.0087 kho bhante bhagavato pāṇātipāto kappati, atha ca pana bhagavā evamāha “hanāmi naṃ kesī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:701_0: Pu – bhayavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:702_1: bhayavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni.
anya-e0904n0:702_3: attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhaya”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:704_1: idāni āvuso bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā saṃgītā aṅguttaranikāyatopi kānici suttāni uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n0:704_2: saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puggalavagge navamaṃ dhammakathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:705_1: puggalavagge bhante navamaṃ dhammakathikasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave dhammakathikā.
anya-e0904n0:705_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca,
anya-e0904n0:705_4: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
anya-e0904n0:705_5: Evarūpo bhikkhave dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:707_0: Pu – indriyavagge pana āvuso sattamaṃ rogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:708_5: Dissanti bhikkhave sattā kāyikena rogena ekampi vassaṃ ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā dvepi vassāni tīṇipi vassāni
anya-e0904n0:708_6: cattāripi vassāni pañcapi vassāni dasapi vassāni vīsampi vassāni tiṃsampi vassāni cattārīsampi vassāni
anya-e0904n0:708_7: paññāsampi vassāni ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā vassasatampi bhiyyopi ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā.
anya-e0904n0:708_9: ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijānanti aññatra khīṇāsavehī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:711_0: Pu – paṭipadāvagge āvuso dasamaṃ yuganaddhasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:712_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “yo hi koci āvuso bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti,
anya-e0904n0:712_2: sabbo so catūhi maggehi etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:714_0: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:715_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ “catunnaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ natthi koci pāṭibhogo samaṇo
anya-e0904n0:715_2: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:717_1: tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:718_1: rājagahe bhante vassakāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ magadhamahāmattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:718_2: Vassakāro bhante brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi yo koci diṭṭhaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me diṭṭha’nti,
anya-e0904n0:718_4: Yo koci sutaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me suta’nti,
anya-e0904n0:718_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “nāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ‘bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi,
anya-e0904n0:718_7: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi,
anya-e0904n0:718_9: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ sutaṃ ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:720_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte brāhmaṇavagge catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:721_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:721_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati,
anya-e0904n0:721_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “atthi brāhmaṇa maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati,
anya-e0904n0:721_6: Atthi pana brāhmaṇa maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati,
anya-e0904n0:721_7: na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:723_0: Pu – mahāvagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:724_1: mahāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ “sotānugatānaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ vacasā paricitānaṃ manasānupekkhitānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:724_2: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:725_0: Ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ.
anya-e0904n0:727_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ bhaddiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:728_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante bhaddiyaṃ licchavi ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:728_2: Bhaddiyo bhante licchavi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0904n0:728_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0904n0:728_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “etha tumhe bhaddiya mā anussavena mā paramparāya mā itikirāya mā piṭakasampadānena
anya-e0904n0:728_8: mā takkahetu mā nayahetu mā ākāravitakkena mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā mā bhabbarūpatāya mā samaṇo no garūti.
anya-e0904n0:728_9: Yadā tumhe bhaddiya attanāva jāneyyātha ‘ime dhammā akusalā,
anya-e0904n0:728_12: ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’ti.
anya-e0904n0:728_13: Atha tumhe bhaddiya pajaheyyāthā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:729_1: imissā ca pana āvuso desanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa kīdiso dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0904n0:729_2: Kathañca naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjitvā taṃ vacanaṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0904n0:730_1: imissā bhante dhammadesanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa sotāpattiphalasaṅkhāto dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0904n0:730_2: Api nu tāhaṃ bhaddiya evaṃ avacaṃ “ehi me tvaṃ bhaddiya sāvako hohi,
anya-e0904n0:730_3: ahaṃ satthā bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā ca naṃ bhante bhagavā paṭipucchitvā anuyuñjitvā taṃ vacanaṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0904n0:732_1: tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mallikādevīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:733_2: Mallikā bhante devī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n0:733_3: yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya,
anya-e0904n0:733_4: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca…pe…
anya-e0904n0:733_5: ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n0:733_6: yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā,
anya-e0904n0:733_7: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā cā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:733_8: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “idha mallike mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:735_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte sappurisavagge catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:736_1: sappurisavagge bhante catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ “asappurisañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi asappurisena asappurisatarañca
anya-e0904n0:736_3: taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:738_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso parisāvagge paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:739_1: parisāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave parisadūsanā.
anya-e0904n0:739_7: Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro parisadūsanā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:742_1: pañcakanipāte pana āvuso paṭhame sekhabalavagge paṭhamaṃ saṃkhittasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:743_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “pañcimāni bhikkhave sekhabalāni.
anya-e0904n0:743_4: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca sekhabalānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:745_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ dukkhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:746_1: tatiyaṃ bhante dukkhasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati
anya-e0904n0:746_2: savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ kāyassa ca bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
anya-e0904n0:746_4: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asaddho hoti ahiriko hoti,
anya-e0904n0:748_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ samāpattisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:749_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante samāpattisuttaṃ “na tāva bhikkhave akusalassa samāpatti hoti,
anya-e0904n0:749_2: yāva saddhā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0904n0:749_3: Yato ca kho bhikkhave saddhā antarahitā hoti asaddhiyaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n0:749_4: atha akusalassa samāpatti hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:751_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ kāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:752_1: sattamaṃ bhante kāmasuttaṃ “yebhuyyena bhikkhave sattā kāmesu laḷitā.
anya-e0904n0:752_2: Asitabyābhaṅgiṃ bhikkhave kulaputto ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0904n0:752_3: saddhāpabbajito kulaputtoti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:754_1: aṅguttaranikāye pañcakanipāte pañcaṅgikavagge chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:755_1: pañcaṅgikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave vimuttāyatanāni,
anya-e0904n0:755_2: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimuccati,
anya-e0904n0:755_4: ananuppattaṃ vā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ anupāpuṇātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:757_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ caṅkamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:758_1: navamaṃ bhante caṅkamasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave caṅkame ānisaṃsā.
anya-e0904n0:758_6: asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0904n0:758_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:760_1: sumanavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sumanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:761_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sumanaṃ rājakumāriṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:761_2: Sumanā bhante rājakumārī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idhassu bhante bhagavato dve sāvakā samasaddhā samasīlā samapaññā eko dāyako eko adāyako.
anya-e0904n0:761_3: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0904n0:761_4: Devabhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ bhante siyā viseso siyā nānākaraṇa”nti.
anya-e0904n0:761_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo so sumane dāyako,
anya-e0904n0:761_6: so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti,
anya-e0904n0:761_7: dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena ādhipateyyena.
anya-e0904n0:761_9: so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:767_1: tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ uggahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:768_1: tatiyaṃ bhante uggahasuttaṃ bhaddiye uggahaṃ meṇḍakanattāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:768_2: Uggaho bhante meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “imā me bhante kumāriyo patikulāni gamissanti,
anya-e0904n0:768_5: yaṃ tāsaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:768_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha kumāriyo evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ” yassa vo mātāpitaro bhattuno dassanti
anya-e0904n0:768_8: tassa bhavissāma pubbuṭṭhāyino pacchānipātiniyo kiṃ kārapaṭissāviniyo manāpacāriniyo piyavādiniyo’ti.
anya-e0904n0:768_9: Evañhi vo kumāriyo sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:770_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte sumanavagge catutthaṃ sīhasenāpatisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:771_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:771_2: Sīho bhante senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sakkā nu kho bhante sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0904n0:771_4: dāyako sīha dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:773_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ kāladānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:774_9: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca kāladānānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:776_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ bhojanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:777_1: sattamaṃ bhante bhojanasuttaṃ “bhojanaṃ bhikkhave dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ pañca ṭhānāni deti.
anya-e0904n0:777_8: Āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:779_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ puttasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:780_1: navamaṃ bhante puttasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni sampassanto mābhāpitaro puttaṃ icchanti kule jāyamānaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:783_1: muṇḍarājavagge panāvuso dasamaṃ nāradasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:784_1: pāṭaliputte bhante muṇḍaṃ rājānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:784_2: Muṇḍassa bhante rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
anya-e0904n0:784_3: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0904n0:784_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcimāni mahārāja alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā
anya-e0904n0:784_7: mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā nāradattherena rañño pasenadissa
anya-e0904n0:788_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte nīvaraṇavagge catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:789_1: nīvaraṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave asamayā padhānāya.
anya-e0904n0:789_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto.
anya-e0904n0:789_4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo asamayo padhānāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:791_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ ṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:792_1: sattamaṃ bhante ṭhānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbāni itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
anya-e0904n0:792_3: jarādhammomhi jaraṃ anatītoti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:794_0: Pu – yodhājīvavagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:795_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:795_2: veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ dutivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:795_6: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu bhikkhu pariyattibahulo no dhammavihārī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:796_0: Dhammavihārī dhammavihārīti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
anya-e0904n0:798_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:799_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena
anya-e0904n0:799_2: alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya
anya-e0904n0:801_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ tatiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:802_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ katiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti,
anya-e0904n0:802_5: bhavissanti bhikkhave bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṃ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:804_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:805_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti,
anya-e0904n0:805_3: paṭibujjhitvā ca tesaṃ pahānāya vāyamitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:808_0: Pu – kakudhavagge āvuso navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:809_1: kakudhavagge bhante navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanhasamayaṃ āsayā nikkhamati,
anya-e0904n0:809_4: samantā catuddisaṃ anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:812_0: Pu – andhakavindavagge pana āvuso “paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:813_1: andhakavindavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu
anya-e0904n0:813_2: kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo cā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:815_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ andhakavindasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:816_1: magadhesu bhante andhakavinde āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha “ye te ānanda bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:816_2: te vo ānanda bhikkhū pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:819_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte gilānavagge dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:820_1: gilānavagge bhante dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ “yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti,
anya-e0904n0:820_3: tassa dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ ‘diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
anya-e0904n0:820_6: idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno ajjhattaññeva satisūpaṭṭhitā hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:822_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:823_1: tatiyaṃ bhante upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
anya-e0904n0:823_5: bhesajjaṃ nappaṭisevitā hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:825_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ anāyussāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:826_1: pañcamaṃ bhante anāyussāsuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā anāyussā.
anya-e0904n0:826_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā anāyussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:828_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ samaṇasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:829_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
anya-e0904n0:829_8: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca samaṇadukkhānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:831_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ byasanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:832_3: ñātibyasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ sīlabyasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasana”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:835_0: Pu – rājavagge pana āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:836_1: rājavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa
anya-e0904n0:836_2: jeṭṭho putto oparajjaṃ patthetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:838_0: Pu – tikaṇḍakīvagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:839_1: tikaṇḍakīvagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave sappurisadānāni.
anya-e0904n0:839_7: attānañca parañca anupahacca dānaṃ detī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:842_0: Pu – saddhammavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:843_1: saddhammavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato sunakkhopi
anya-e0904n0:843_2: saddhammaṃ abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:845_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:846_1: tattheva bhante catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n0:846_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanti,
anya-e0904n0:846_6: na sakkaccaṃ dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti,
anya-e0904n0:846_7: na sakkaccaṃ atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti.
anya-e0904n0:846_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:848_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:849_1: tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n0:849_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū dhammaṃ na pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:849_4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:851_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:852_1: tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n0:852_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū duggahitaṃ suttantaṃ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittahi padabyañjanehi.
anya-e0904n0:852_4: Dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
anya-e0904n0:852_5: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:854_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte saddhammavagge sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:855_1: saddhammavagge bhante sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ “pañcannaṃ bhikkhave puggalānaṃ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya.
anya-e0904n0:855_7: duppaññassa paññākathā dukkathā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:857_1: tattheva āvuso navamaṃ udāyisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:858_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:858_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā gīhiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
anya-e0904n0:858_3: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:858_6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:858_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ānanda sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ,
anya-e0904n0:858_8: paresaṃ ānanda dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:861_0: Pu – āghātavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:862_1: āghātavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave āghātapaṭivinayā,
anya-e0904n0:862_2: yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
anya-e0904n0:862_6: evaṃ tasmiṃ puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:865_0: Pu – upāsakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:866_1: upāsakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo
anya-e0904n0:866_2: ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:868_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ pītisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:869_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante pītisuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “tumhe kho gahapati bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e0904n0:869_3: Na kho gahapati tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā “mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilāna paccaya bhesajjaparikkhārenā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:869_4: Tasmātiha gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “kindi mayaṃ kālena kālaṃ pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja vihareyyāmā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:871_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:872_1: tattheva bhante sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ “pañcimā bhikkhave vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā.
anya-e0904n0:872_4: Imā kho bhikkhave pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:874_1: tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ gavesīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:875_1: dasamaṃ bhante gavesīsuttaṃ kosalesu āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:875_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya,
anya-e0904n0:875_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bhūtapubbaṃ ānanda imasmiṃ padese nagaraṃ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:875_5: taṃ kho panānanda nagaraṃ kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:877_0: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:878_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā,
anya-e0904n0:878_9: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā,
anya-e0904n0:878_10: anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūna”nti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:880_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:881_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ “yaṃ bhikkhave sīlavanto pabbajitā kulaṃ upasaṅkamanti,
anya-e0904n0:881_2: tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
anya-e0904n0:881_4: yasmiṃ bhikkhave samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni pasādenti,
anya-e0904n0:881_5: saggasaṃvattanikaṃ bhikkhave taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:884_0: Pu – kimilavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:885_1: kimilavagge bhante dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṃsā dhammassavane.
anya-e0904n0:885_8: ime kho bhikkhave pañca ānisaṃsā dhammassavane”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:888_0: Pu – akkosakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:889_1: akkosakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
anya-e0904n0:889_7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:891_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:892_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā apāsādike.
anya-e0904n0:892_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā apāsādike”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:895_0: Pu – āvāsikavagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:896_1: āvāsikavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
anya-e0904n0:896_8: Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:898_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:899_1: tattheva bhante sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
anya-e0904n0:899_8: Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:902_0: Pu – duccaritavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:903_1: duccaritavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā duccarite.
anya-e0904n0:903_7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0904n0:903_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā duccarite”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:905_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:906_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā sivathikāya.
anya-e0904n0:906_7: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā sivathikāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
